trans-unit.source: Represents session-state data for a session store.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作階段存放區的工作階段狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別可由 ASP.NET 和自訂的工作階段狀態存放區的實施者來傳遞工作階段狀態資訊的<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別用來代表工作階段儲存區的工作階段狀態資料<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A> information for the current session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件包含的工作階段狀態變數的名稱和值，靜態物件參考和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>目前工作階段的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The session variables and values for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 目前工作階段的工作階段變數和值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection" /> for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 目前工作階段的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout" /> for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 目前工作階段的 <see cref="P:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別用來代表工作階段儲存區的工作階段狀態資料<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A> information for the current session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件包含的工作階段狀態變數的名稱和值，靜態物件參考和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>目前工作階段的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>類別可由 ASP.NET 和自訂的工作階段狀態存放區的實施者來傳遞工作階段狀態資訊的<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。

trans-unit.source: Custom session-store implementers construct a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object in implementations of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateNewStoreData%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 自訂工作階段的存放區實作者建構<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>物件中的實作<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateNewStoreData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The session variables and values for the current session.
trans-unit.target: 目前工作階段的工作階段變數和值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection" /> object that contains variables and values for the current session.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection" /> 物件，包含目前工作階段的變數和值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Items%2A> property references the session-state variables that are exposed to ASP.NET application code using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class, which is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Items%2A>屬性參考會公開至 ASP.NET 應用程式程式碼使用的工作階段狀態變數<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別，可使用存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, session-state variables are managed using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，工作階段狀態變數會管理使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: Custom session-store implementers can supply their own implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 自訂工作階段的存放區實作者可以提供自己的實作<xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects declared by <see langword="<object Runat="Server" Scope="Session"/>" /> tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.
trans-unit.target: 取得由 ASP.NET 應用程式檔 Global.asax 內 <see langword="<object Runat="Server" Scope="Session"/>" /> 標記所宣告的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection" /> containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection" />，包含 Global.asax 檔案中所宣告的物件。

trans-unit.source: The
trans-unit.target: 必須提供

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> 屬性被提供為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容。

trans-unit.source: Custom session-store implementers can obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection> class for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 自訂工作階段的存放區實作者可以取得參考<xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>目前類別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>執行個體使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom objects stored in the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> collection must support binary serialization.
trans-unit.target: 自訂物件儲存在<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A>集合必須支援二進位序列化。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.
trans-unit.target: 取得並設定工作階段狀態提供者終止工作階段之前，要求之間所允許的時間長度 (以分鐘為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The time-out period in minutes.
trans-unit.target: 逾時週期 (以分鐘為單位)。
